short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide elements in Street View mode on Google Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension allows you to toggle visibility of all information elements in Street View mode on Google Maps. Useful if you want to, for example, challenge someone to guess a particular location and prevent them from just reading the place name from the title, titlecard or minimap.
